Mini 1352:Leprechaun Mafia

There once was a village so quiet
That travelers often passed by it
Full of little green men
Who drank whiskey and gin
'Til one died and now there's a riot

Unlike their gin their cheeks were not dried
The men and women well they all cried
This was foul play for sure
But this they would endure
For the culprits will surely be fried



Dem Rules

Dem Rules
1. Its a game. Play to win, play to have fun.
2. Votes need to be in bold or vote format, vote: waffles and VOTE: pancake, respectively. Unvotes aren't required.
3. Vote counts will be as close to the top of the page as humanly possible.
4. If I make a mistake, tell me.
5. Don't discuss the game outside the thread or designated quicktopics. Round these parts we call that cheatin'.
6. Don't quote mod<-> player interactions.
7. Day deadlines are 14 days. Extensions are rare.
8. Send me a PM or post in thread if you are gonna be V/LA. Don't just post in the V/LA thread, I'm not a regular subscriber.
9. Prods are 48 hours of inactivity. Another 48 hours without a response and out ya go. I'll replace ya.
10. Majority rules. It takes a majority to lynch. That's over 50%, not exactly 50%. If by deadline there is no majority, than there is no lynch.
11. Once you lynch, we go into night. Nights will be 48 hours long.
12. No bah posts. Sorry.
13. Blue is my color, not yours. That means all the blues are mine. Don't use them.
14. Anything illegal to do is illegal to fake.
15. These rules are subject to change by yours truly.
16. No PM means no night action, so get it in. You can send it in advance. Scum can't send in for buddies. This is a team effort, people.
